sections.heading: 01|Health insuring corporation law definitions
sections.text: Effective:April 11, 2021Latest Legislation:Senate Bill 276 - 133rd General AssemblyPDF:Download Authenticated PDFAs used in this chapter:(A)(1) "Basic health care services" means the following services when medically necessary:(a) Physician's services,

sections.heading: the Revised Code apply to every health insuring corporation that offers long-term care and that holds a certificate of authority under this chapter.
sections.text: the Revised Code apply to every health insuring corporation that offers long-term care and that holds a certificate of authority under this chapter.
